Directions: In the following question, there are two statements, Assertion (A) and Reason (R). Consider both the statements independently and mark your answer.

Reason: It occurs in warm, dry and sunny climate.

A. SO3 is a more harmful air pollutant than SO2.
B. NO is more toxic to living tissues than NO2.
C. NOx does not play any role in photochemical smog.
